**************************************************************

When the katamari's ready, let's go out 
Shall we aimlessly stroll down the back streets? 
Look, take a look out the window 
a vapor trail in the sky 
That was when 
a warm summer breeze blew in

In the process of searching the early afternoon town 
I take your hand and we pass the time 
It was a time we felt happiness in the little things 
ah...

ooh... It was a lively, 
peach-colored season

lalala...

You and I will now think 
because we grew just a tiny bit 
It's a time we want to feel happiness 
with little things 
ooh... It was a lively, 
cherry-blossom colored season

lalala...

author: Mitchell Scripter

text: @Mitchell Scripter¬†The ones who are so fortunate to be rolled up in His Katamari are happy to be there. Any screams you hear are screams of joy and grateful submission. You are chosen to be liberated from your Earth life to live forever as a beautiful burning star in service to the entire cosmos, it is an honor most grand and to not be glad to be clumped together with such love and purpose is besmirching His gifts. author: hushicho

text: One of the most beautiful and touching songs I have ever heard in my life. It is simultaneously warming and a little painfully sad...it is a song that makes me recall the one who introduced me to the first Katamari Damacy, and we were together many years before his sudden passing. I always think back to that 'cherry-blossom color season' now, whenever I hear this song...
